name: Sonia - The Forest and the Sword
name_original: Sonia - The Forest and the Sword
description:
The Adventures of Sonia - The Forest and the Sword is a 2D platform game, inspired by the classic games of the 16-bit era, where you take on the role of Sonia and need to rescue the dreams of the children who were stolen by Boogeyman. You will be taken into the universe of the stories written by Brothers Grimm and Christian Andersen.

We are providing the first version (Demo) of our game, so we will need your help to test and evaluate our product. Do not forget to share with friends.

Download, test and enjoy The Adventures of Sonia.
We will wait for your feedback, about what you think and how we can improve it.

Access our page: Facebook/Manivastudios

Also go to Instagram: Instagram/ManivaStudios

Thank you.

[Do not forget to report bugs, thank you]  ;)

<----PORTUGUÊS------>

Você será levado ao universo das histórias escritas pelos Irmãos Grimm e Christian Andersen.

Estamos fornecendo a primeira versão (Demo) do nosso jogo, então precisamos de sua ajuda para testar e avaliar o nosso produto. Não se esqueça de compartilhar com os amigos.

Baixe, teste e aproveite As Aventuras de Sonia.
Esperamos seu comentário e como podemos melhorar o Jogo.
